lead_paragraph: Airstrikes by the Saudi-led military coalition hit the home of a senior judge in Sana, killing the judge along with his relatives.

headline.print_headline: Middle East; Yemen: Senior Judge and 6 Relatives Are Killed in Airstrike on His Home
headline.main: Yemen: Top Judge and 6 Relatives Are Killed in Airstrike

snippet: Airstrikes by the Saudi-led military coalition hit the home of a senior judge in Sana, killing the judge along with his relatives.
abstract: Saudi-led military coalition's airstrike on Sana, Yemen, hits home of Yayha Alrubaid, senior judge who had prosecuted members of Saudi-backed government who were in exile for high treason; strike kills Alrubaid and six of his relatives.
